verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man ח֥וּד <S%H2330><s%> chud put forth חִידָ֖ה <S%H2420><s%> chi-Dah a riddle וּמְשֹׁ֣ל <S%H4911><s%> u-me-Shol and speak מָשָׁ֑ל <S%H4912><s%> ma-Shal; a parable אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD הַנֶּ֤שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> han-Ne-sher eagle הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-dOl A great גְּד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ge-Dol with great הַכְּנָפַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3671><s%> hak-ke-na-Fa-yim wings אֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> 'E-rech long הָאֵ֔בֶר <S%H83><s%> ha-'E-ver, pinions מָלֵא֙ <S%H4392><s%> ma-Le full הַנּוֹצָ֔ה <S%H5133><s%> han-no-Tzah, of feathers אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֖וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo הָֽרִקְמָ֑ה <S%H7553><s%> ha-rik-Mah; which had divers colours בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> ba came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-Non, unto Lebanon וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צַמֶּ֥רֶת <S%H6788><s%> tzam-Me-ret the highest branch הָאָֽרֶז׃ <S%H730><s%> ha-'A-rez. of the cedar

אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the top יְנִֽיקוֹתָ֖יו <S%H3242><s%> ye-ni-ko-Tav of his young twigs קָטָ֑ף <S%H6998><s%> ka-Taf; He cropped off וַיְבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'E-hu and carried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz it into a land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of traffick בְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> be-'Ir it in a city רֹכְלִ֖ים <S%H7402><s%> ro-che-Lim of merchants שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mo. he set

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach He took מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> miz-Ze-ra' also of the seed הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Ne-hu and planted בִּשְׂדֵה־ <S%H7704><s%> bis-deh- field זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> Za-ra'; it in a fruitful קָ֚ח <S%H3947><s%> kach he placed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, [it] by great צַפְצָפָ֖ה <S%H6851><s%> tzaf-tza-Fah it [as] a willow tree שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mo. [and] set

וַיִּצְמַ֡ח <S%H6779><s%> vai-yitz-Mach And it grew וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi and became לְגֶ֨פֶן <S%H1612><s%> le-Ge-fen vine סֹרַ֜חַת <S%H5628><s%> so-Ra-chat and became a spreading שִׁפְלַ֣ת <S%H8217><s%> shif-Lat of low קוֹמָ֗ה <S%H6967><s%> ko-Mah, stature לִפְנ֤וֹת <S%H6437><s%> lif-Not turned דָּלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <S%H1808><s%> da-li-yo-Tav whose branches אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, toward וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <S%H8328><s%> ve-sha-ra-Shav toward him and the roots תַּחְתָּ֣יו <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav under יִֽהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu; remained וַתְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi became לְגֶ֔פֶן <S%H1612><s%> le-Ge-fen, thereof were under him so it became a vine וַתַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vat-Ta-'as and brought forth בַּדִּ֔ים <S%H905><s%> bad-Dim, branches וַתְּשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> vat-te-shal-Lach and shot פֹּארֽוֹת׃ <S%H6288><s%> po-Rot. forth sprigs

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become נֶֽשֶׁר־ <S%H5404><s%> ne-sher- eagle אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad There was also another גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, great גְּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ge-Dol with great כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fa-yim wings וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> ve-rav- and many נוֹצָ֑ה <S%H5133><s%> no-Tzah; feathers וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַגֶּ֨פֶן <S%H1612><s%> hag-Ge-fen and behold this vine הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise כָּֽפְנָ֧ה <S%H3719><s%> ka-fe-Nah did bend שָׁרֳשֶׁ֣יהָ <S%H8328><s%> sho-ro-Shei-ha her roots עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, toward וְדָֽלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <S%H1808><s%> ve-da-li-yo-Tav her branches שִׁלְחָה־ <S%H7971><s%> shil-chah- toward him and shot forth לּ֔וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo, לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <S%H8248><s%> le-hash-Kot toward him that he might water אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah, מֵעֲרֻג֖וֹת <S%H6170><s%> me-'a-ru-Got it by the furrows מַטָּעָֽהּ׃ <S%H4302><s%> mat-ta-'Ah. of her plantation

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- beside שָׂ֥דֶה <S%H7704><s%> Sa-deh soil טּ֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov in a good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- beside מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim by great הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi it was שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <S%H8362><s%> she-tu-Lah; It was planted לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that it might bring forth עָנָף֙ <S%H6057><s%> 'a-Naf branches וְלָשֵׂ֣את <S%H5375><s%> ve-la-Set and that it might bear פֶּ֔רִי <S%H6529><s%> Pe-ri, fruit לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become לְגֶ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> le-Ge-fen vine אַדָּֽרֶת׃ <S%H155><s%> 'ad-Da-ret. that it might be a goodly ס sa-Mek

אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor, Say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thou Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD תִּצְלָ֑ח <S%H6743><s%> titz-Lach; Shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lO nor אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁרָשֶׁ֨יהָ <S%H8328><s%> sha-ra-Shei-ha the roots יְנַתֵּ֜ק <S%H5423><s%> ye-nat-Tek ;shall he not pull up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פִּרְיָ֣הּ׀ <S%H6529><s%> pir-Yah the fruit יְקוֹסֵ֣ס <S%H7082><s%> ye-ko-Ses thereof and cut off וְיָבֵ֗שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ve-ya-Vesh, thereof that it wither כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner טַרְפֵּ֤י <S%H2964><s%> tar-Pei in all the leaves צִמְחָהּ֙ <S%H6780><s%> tzim-Chah of her spring תִּיבָ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ti-Vash, ;it shall wither וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor בִזְרֹ֤עַ <S%H2220><s%> viz-Ro-a' power גְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah even without great וּבְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> u-ve-'am- people רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, or many לְמַשְׂא֥וֹת <S%H5375><s%> le-mas-'ot to pluck it up אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah מִשָּׁרָשֶֽׁיהָ׃ <S%H8328><s%> mish-sha-ra-Shei-ha. by the roots

וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh Behold שְׁתוּלָ֖ה <S%H8362><s%> she-tu-Lah Yea behold [being] planted הֲתִצְלָ֑ח <S%H6743><s%> ha-titz-Lach; shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lO not כְגַ֨עַת <S%H5060><s%> che-Ga-'at toucheth בָּ֜הּ bah ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach wind הַקָּדִים֙ <S%H6921><s%> hak-ka-Dim when the east תִּיבַ֣שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ti-Vash ;shall it not utterly יָבֹ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ya-Vosh, wither עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on עֲרֻגֹ֥ת <S%H6170><s%> 'a-ru-Got in the furrows צִמְחָ֖הּ <S%H6780><s%> tzim-Chah where it grew תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> ti-Vash. it;it shall wither פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> 'e-mor- Say נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit house הַמֶּ֔רִי <S%H4805><s%> ham-Me-ri, now to the rebellious הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not יְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tem Know מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; these אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor, ye not what these [things mean];tell הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold בָ֨א <S%H935><s%> va is come מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- [them] Behold the king בָּבֶ֤ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and hath taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַלְכָּהּ֙ <S%H4428><s%> mal-Kah the king וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שָׂרֶ֔יהָ <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei-ha, thereof and the princes וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve thereof and led אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> ba-Ve-lah. them with him to Babylon

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And hath taken מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> miz-Ze-ra' seed הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <S%H4410><s%> ham-me-lu-Chah, of the king's וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot and made אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit; a covenant וַיָּבֵ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve with him and hath taken אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To בְּאָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> be-'a-Lah, an oath וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֵילֵ֥י <S%H352><s%> 'ei-Lei the mighty הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land לָקָֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach. of him he hath also taken

לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <S%H1961><s%> lih-yOt become מַמְלָכָ֣ה <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chah That the kingdom שְׁפָלָ֔ה <S%H8217><s%> she-fa-Lah, might be base לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not הִתְנַשֵּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> hit-nas-Se; that it might not lift itself up לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor [but] that by keeping אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִית֖וֹ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To of his covenant לְעָמְדָֽהּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> le-'a-me-Dah. it might stand

וַיִּמְרָד־ <S%H4775><s%> vai-yim-rod- But he rebelled בּ֗וֹ bo, לִשְׁלֹ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> lish-Lo-ach against him in sending מַלְאָכָיו֙ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chav his ambassadors מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, into Egypt לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> la-tet- that they might give ל֥וֹ lo סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim him horses וְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am- people רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav; and much הֲיִצְלָ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> ha-yitz-Lach Shall he prosper הֲיִמָּלֵט֙ <S%H4422><s%> ha-yim-ma-Let ;shall he escape הָעֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ha-'o-Seh that doeth אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh, such וְהֵפֵ֥ר <S%H6565><s%> ve-he-Fer such [things];or shall he break בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit the covenant וְנִמְלָֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> ve-nim-Lat. and be delivered

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- [As] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֮ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> Lo, not בִּמְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> bim-kOm surely in the place הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech [where] the king הַמַּמְלִ֣יךְ <S%H4427><s%> ham-mam-Lich [dwelleth] that made him king אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose בָּזָה֙ <S%H959><s%> ba-Zah he despised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָ֣לָת֔וֹ <S%H423><s%> a-la-To, whose oath וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and whose הֵפֵ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> he-Fer he brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To; and whose covenant אִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To in בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> ve-toch- [even] with him in the midst בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut. he shall die
